name: Anonymous
comment:
>>38006129

"Smith?" You ask, looking inside, before gesturing to Tatsumaki, who joins you at your side.

"I don't think he's here, buddy." Donnel says. "We might want to move further into the city. See where we're needed, before we get picked off in the alleyways."

"We can at least have a look." You flick open a fluorescent torch and begin into the dark warehouse. Tatsumaki's next to you, with Aelriss in the middle and the other two bringing up the rear. As you enter, you see the gleam of your torch-light on something to your left, and hear the familiar sound of retractable blades expanding.

"Ascheritte! On your left!"

> [[ 1d100 ]]
